subtitle: This recipe has a French feel to it using rose wine, garlic and lamb's lettuce.

method.text: Halve any large shiitake and oyster mushrooms.
Heat oil. Add garlic and shiitake mushrooms and cook in covered pan over medium heat for 1 min. Stir in oyster and chestnut mushrooms with the wine and cook for 1 min. Allow to cool.
Season to taste. Gently stir in lamb's lettuce and spoon onto plates. Drizzle over some extra-virgin olive oil. Enjoy the rest of the wine with your meal!

title: Exotic mushrooms in garlic and rose wine
